Class Tetris

java.lang.Object
Tetris
public class Tetris
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Tetris​(processing.core.PApplet marker)
    Instantiates this Tetris Game with a grid of 30x30 pixel Squares that encompasses the entirety of the window Initializes the falling block

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void act​(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
    places falling block whenever it touches the bottom or falls on top of a block drops another random block once the previous block was placed detects when rows are filled, adds points, deletes them from the screen and rearranges the rows above to fall down
    void deleteRow​(int r)
    deletes the row of placed blocks, moves the rows above down 1 so that everything falls black into place
    void detectRow()
    detects when a row of placed blocks is full, updates points, and deletes it
    void draw​(processing.core.PApplet marker)
    draws the placed tetrisBlocks and the falling block
    TetrisBlock getFallingBlock()  
    int getNumFallenBlocks()  
    boolean isGameOver​(Line top)
    determines when this tetris game is over the game is over when at least one of the placed blocks touches the top of the window
    void placeBlock()
    adds the falling block to the array of placed blocks in this tetris game
    void resetFallingBlock​(int windowWidth)
    creates a new random tetris block and drops it from a random x at the top of the screen

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Tetris

      public Tetris​(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      Instantiates this Tetris Game with a grid of 30x30 pixel Squares that encompasses the entirety of the window Initializes the falling block
      Parameters:
      marker - PApplet to provide the height and width of the window

  • Method Details

    • act

      public void act​(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
      places falling block whenever it touches the bottom or falls on top of a block drops another random block once the previous block was placed detects when rows are filled, adds points, deletes them from the screen and rearranges the rows above to fall down

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      draws the placed tetrisBlocks and the falling block
      Parameters:
      marker - PApplet with which to draw this Tetris game with

    • resetFallingBlock

      public void resetFallingBlock​(int windowWidth)
      creates a new random tetris block and drops it from a random x at the top of the screen
      Parameters:
      windowWidth - width of the window

    • placeBlock

      public void placeBlock()
      adds the falling block to the array of placed blocks in this tetris game

    • detectRow

      public void detectRow()
      detects when a row of placed blocks is full, updates points, and deletes it

    • getFallingBlock

      public TetrisBlock getFallingBlock()
      Returns:
      the Tetris Block that is falling at this moment in the game

    • getNumFallenBlocks

      public int getNumFallenBlocks()
      Returns:
      the current number of points that the user has scored

    • deleteRow

      public void deleteRow​(int r)
      deletes the row of placed blocks, moves the rows above down 1 so that everything falls black into place
      Parameters:
      r - row to be deleted

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver​(Line top)
      determines when this tetris game is over the game is over when at least one of the placed blocks touches the top of the window
      Parameters:
      top - the top Line of the window
      Returns:
      false if there are no blocks touching the top of the window, true if there are
